verse: The words of Jeremiah son of Hilkiah, one of the kohanim who were in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin.
The word of Adonai came to him during the days of King Josiah of Judah, son of Amon, in the thirteenth year of his reign.
It continued during the days of King Jehoiakim of Judah, son of Josiah, until the end of the eleventh year of King Zedekiah of Judah, son of Josiah—until the exile from Jerusalem in the fifth month.
The word of Adonai came to me, saying:
Then Adonai stretched out His hand and touched my mouth and Adonai said to me,
Moreover, the word of Adonai came to me, saying, “What do you see, Jeremiah?”
Then Adonai said to me, “You have seen correctly, for I am watching over My word to perform it.”
The word of Adonai came to me a second time, saying, “What do you see?”
